## GridComponent class

Grid component used for rendering grid

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GridComponent implements OnInit, AfterViewInit, Grid 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [gridOptions](./grid.gridcomponent.gridoptions.md) |  | <code>GridOptions</code> | Gets or sets grid options |
|  [initialized](./grid.gridcomponent.initialized.md) |  | <code>Observable&lt;boolean&gt;</code> | Occurs every time when grid is initialized or reinitialized |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [execute(actions)](./grid.gridcomponent.execute.md) |  | Executes actions on grid |
|  [executeAndReturn(func)](./grid.gridcomponent.executeandreturn.md) |  | Executes function on grid and returns result |
|  [getPlugin(pluginId)](./grid.gridcomponent.getplugin.md) |  | Gets instance of plugin by its id |
|  [initialize()](./grid.gridcomponent.initialize.md) |  | Initialize component, automatically called once if not blocked by options |
|  [initOptions()](./grid.gridcomponent.initoptions.md) |  | Initialize options, automaticaly called during init phase, but can be used to reinitialize GridOptions |
|  [invalidateVisuals()](./grid.gridcomponent.invalidatevisuals.md) |  | Explicitly runs invalidation of content (change detection) |
|  [ngAfterViewInit()](./grid.gridcomponent.ngafterviewinit.md) |  | Called when view was initialized |
|  [ngOnInit()](./grid.gridcomponent.ngoninit.md) |  | Initialize component |
|  [setGridPluginInstances(plugin)](./grid.gridcomponent.setgridplugininstances.md) |  | Sets GridPluginInstances into GridPlugin |
